help.commandDescription: See informations about my commands or list them.
help.commandNotFound: I couldn't find a command with that name!
help.title: Commands
help.youCanUse: but you can also use {{- botMention}} as a prefix.

avatar.commandDescription: Sees the avatar from an user.

guildinfo.commandDescription: See some informations about a guild.

userinfo.commandDescription: See some informations about an user.

math.invalidMathExpression: You need to inform a valid math expression!
math.title: Result `{{result}}`

github.commandDescription: Sees the github of an user.
github.missingParameters: You need to inform the name of a Github user.
github.userNotFound: No user with the name '{{user}}' found.
github.noBio: No bio found for this user.

channelinfo.noTopic: This channel doesn't have a topic.

createemoji.commandDescription: Create an emoji in the current guild.
createemoji.noImage: You need to inform a valid image for the emoji.
createemoji.noName: You need to inform a name for the emoji.

deleteemoji.commandDescription: Delete an emoji in the current guild.
deleteemoji.invalidEmoji: You need to inform a valid emoji.

kick.commandDescription: Kicks a member from this server.
kick.missingUser: You have to give me a member to kick!
kick.missingReason: You have to give me a reason for kicking!
kick.noPermission: I'm missing the **$t(permissions:KICK_MEMBERS)** permission to kick this member.

ban.commandDescription: Bans a member from this server.
ban.missingUser: You have to give me a member to ban!
ban.missingReason: You have to give me a reason for banning!
ban.noPermission: I'm missing the **$t(permissions:BAN_MEMBERS)** permission to ban this member.

purge.invalidNumber: You have to give me a number between 1 and 100!
